name: Sastasha
content:
Trash

  • In the dead end at the first corridor there's a note saying which colour coral summons the boss

Chopper

  • Charged Whisker inflicts paralysis on anyone stood in the AOE

Captain Madison

  • Tank and spank

Denn the Orcatoothed

  • Ignore the grates and just focus down the boss, it'll die before adds become a problem
